name: realistic
content:

B2 accepting things as they are in fact and not making decisions based on unlikely hopes for the future: Let's be realistic (about this) - I just can't afford to pay that much money. It isn't realistic to expect people to work for so little money.
B2 seeming to exist or be happening in fact: The special effects were so realistic.
More examplesFewer examplesManufacturers and shops circumnavigate gun laws by providing realistic models which are unable to discharge missiles.The prediction of 4 million unemployed now looks horrifyingly realistic.Her plans are not realistic - they'll never be more than a pipe dream.You should try to restrain your ambitions and be more realistic.A good artist can produce a very realistic effect using only light and shade.
